form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Immigration Visa and Alien Registration Application

full_text: Form F (Chinese-English) 2-68 Form Approved. Budget Bureau No. 47-R0150. DEPARTMENT OF STATE B APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. ALL questions must be answered, if applicable Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in duplicate using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $5.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. 1. Family HO (YUEN) name & First name and middle name WAI FONG. 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman. give maiden name) YUEN WAI FONG. 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman Letters not used) 4. Date of birth Age 6. # # # Place of birth Year A Month E Day (Country) (Province) (City or town) 1911 8 5 65 China Kwang Tung Canton 7. Nationality 8. Sex 9. Marital status Chinese * Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Male Female * Including my present marriage, I have been married times. 10. Occupation 11. Present address Housewife. 37-2 Lane 60, Kuang Fu North Road, Taipei, Taiwan. 12. Purpose in going to the 13. United States Emigration and Name d address SIN. wife/husband (Give maiden name of wife) Permanent stay. 37- Lane 60, Kuang Fu North Road, Taipei, Taiwan. 14. 15. Names and addresses of children under 21 years of age Person(s) named in 13 (will) wXXnYt)accompany None (Not Applicable) or follow. me to the United States. (Cross out words that do not apply) 16. 17. Intended port of entry Length of intended stay permanently, so state) Permanently. Los Angeles. 18. Final address in the United States 19. 813E, Acacia Avenue, Glendale, Do you have a ticket to final destination? Yes. California, 91205, U.S.A. 20. 21. Person you intend to join (Give name, address and Name and address of sponsoring person or organization relationship, if any) Mrs. Kathy King, (If different from 20) Mrs. Ruth F. (daughter) 813E, Acacia Avenue, worland, No. 6, Lane 18, Road 5, Glendale, California, 91205 U.S.A. Tien Mou, Taipei, Taiwan. 22. Personal description 23. Marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height None. (Not Applicable) Black *Rfeet +inches (b) Color of eyes (d) Complexion Dark Brown. Fair. 24. The following documents are submitted in support of this application Birth certificate Death certificate Evidence of own assets Medical record(s) Police certificate(s) Divorce decree Affidavit of support Photographs #1 () Marriage certificate Military record Offer of employment Other (describe) THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
